pr_title: Provide meaningful type of peer addresses instead of just String

timeline.message: Parse peer addresses into a PeerAddress type which may be specific to a particular P2PNetwork implementation.
Use PeerAddress to connect to discovery peers as well.

timeline.author: cemozerr

timeline.message:
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into peer-address2
